amendment.description: To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from using funds to go forward with its proposed cash balance regulation.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1905 proposed by Senator Harkin. (consideration: CR S13089-13091; text: CR S13089) To prohibit the Internal Revenue Service from using funds to go forward with its proposed cash balance regulation.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1905 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1905 proposed by Senator Harkin.
